section_title: SEMINAR OF GOVERNMENTAL EXPERTS AND SB 22 :
sentences: This seminar took place in May 2005, in Bonn.
Delegates started to address some of the broader issues facing the climate change process, including a future framework and commitments beyond 2012.
Immediately following the seminar, SB 22 convened, focusing on preparations for COP 11 and COP/MOP 1, and addressing a variety of issues ranging from budgetary matters to adaptation and mitigation.
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
